kou commented on a change in pull request #2900: ARROW-3697: [Ruby] Add schema[:field_name] and schema.each methods
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2900#discussion_r230571753
 
 

 ##########
 File path: ruby/red-arrow/test/test-schema.rb
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance

+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+class SchemaTest < Test::Unit::TestCase
+  def setup
+    @count_field = Arrow::Field.new("count", :uint32)
+    @visible_field = Arrow::Field.new("visible", :boolean)
+    @schema = Arrow::Schema.new([@count_field, @visible_field])
+  end
+
+  test("#[]") do
+    assert_equal([@count_field, @visible_field],
+                 [@schema[:count], @schema[:visible]])
+  end
 
 Review comment:
   Can you add a test case for `assert_equal([@count_field, @visible_field], [@schema[0], @schema[1]])`?

----------------------------------------------------------------

kou commented on a change in pull request #2900: ARROW-3697: [Ruby] Add schema[:field_name] and schema.each methods
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2900#discussion_r230571744
 
 

 ##########
 File path: ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/schema.rb
 ##########
 @@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+module Arrow
+  class Schema
+    include Enumerable
+
+    alias_method :[], :get_field_by_name
+
+    def each(&block)
+      return to_enum(__method__) unless block_given?
+
+      fields.each(&block)
+    end
 
 Review comment:
   Ah, sorry...
   I forgot that `Schema#fields` exists. We don't need `Schema#each`. We should use `schema.fields.each` instead of `schema.each`.

----------------------------------------------------------------

kou closed pull request #2900: ARROW-3697: [Ruby] Add schema#[]
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2900
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/loader.rb b/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/loader.rb
index 4cb633b288..83555d15f2 100644
--- a/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/loader.rb
+++ b/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/loader.rb
@@ -45,6 +45,7 @@ def require_libraries
       require "arrow/record"
       require "arrow/record-batch"
       require "arrow/rolling-window"
+      require "arrow/schema"
       require "arrow/slicer"
       require "arrow/struct-array"
       require "arrow/table"
diff --git a/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/schema.rb b/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/schema.rb
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..09713b621e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/ruby/red-arrow/lib/arrow/schema.rb
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+module Arrow
+  class Schema
+    def [](name_or_index)
+      case name_or_index
+      when String, Symbol
+        name = name_or_index
+        get_field_by_name(name)
+      when Integer
+        index = name_or_index
+        fields[index]
+      else
+        message = "field name or index must be String, Symbol or Integer"
+        message << ": <#{name_or_index.inspect}>"
+        raise ArgumentError, message
+      end
+    end
+  end
+end
diff --git a/ruby/red-arrow/test/test-schema.rb b/ruby/red-arrow/test/test-schema.rb
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000..2f989cf19f
--- /dev/null
+++ b/ruby/red-arrow/test/test-schema.rb
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#   http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing,
+# software distributed under the License is distributed on an
+# "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY
+# KIND, either express or implied.  See the License for the
+# specific language governing permissions and limitations
+# under the License.
+
+class SchemaTest < Test::Unit::TestCase
+  def setup
+    @count_field = Arrow::Field.new("count", :uint32)
+    @visible_field = Arrow::Field.new("visible", :boolean)
+    @schema = Arrow::Schema.new([@count_field, @visible_field])
+  end
+
+  sub_test_case("#[]") do
+    test("[String]") do
+      assert_equal([@count_field, @visible_field],
+                   [@schema["count"], @schema["visible"]])
+    end
+
+    test("[Symbol]") do
+      assert_equal([@count_field, @visible_field],
+                   [@schema[:count], @schema[:visible]])
+    end
+
+    test("[Integer]") do
+      assert_equal([@count_field, @visible_field],
+                   [@schema[0], @schema[1]])
+    end
+
+    test("[invalid]") do
+      invalid = []
+      message = "field name or index must be String, Symbol or Integer"
+      message << ": <#{invalid.inspect}>"
+      assert_raise(ArgumentError.new(message)) do
+        @schema[invalid]
+      end
+    end
+  end
+end
